## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [not9b-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Hypersensitive to FR light with  regard to inhibition of hypocotyl growth. Increased anthocyanin levels.
   - [not9b-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Hypersensitive to FR light with  regard to inhibition of hypocotyl growth. Increased anthocyanin levels.
